predicate.note: Frames file for 'admire' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.2, Framenet entry Judgement.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Lieber, the actor who plays Mr. Hoffman, says he was concerned at first that the script would ``misrepresent an astute political mind, [one]-1 that I admired *trace*-1,'' but that his concerns were allayed.
